caption.title:
Marginal probability distributions of posterior modes Q
I , Q
S , Q
L , and Q
C for a subset of parameters.
caption.p:
Marginal posterior distributions with 1000 samples from each posterior mode are shown for α scpH, α scpV, k vec, and k hum. Gaussian kernel density estimates are plotted in the upper triangular, marginal probability distributions are plotted on the diagonal, and the samples are shown in the lower triangular. Q
I : black, Q
S : blue, Q
L : green, and Q
C : red.
